trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl"></xref> control.

The HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner class is a base class for deriving your own data source designer for a custom data source control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class.
Other classes that derive from HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner are <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner"></xref> class.
Gets the action list collection for the control designer.

A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> object that contains the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> items for the control designer.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.Configure*> method can be called.
A design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], uses this property to determine whether to show a **Configure** command in the Smart-Tag menu in design view.
This implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> method can be called.

A design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], uses this property to determine whether to show a **Refresh Schema** command in the Smart-Tag menu in design view.
This implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Launches the configuration wizard for the underlying data source.
The Configure method is not supported in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner> class.
In all cases.
Occurs when any property of the associated data source changes.
To be added.
Gets the HTML markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
The HTML markup used to represent the control at design time.
Gets the named data source view associated with the data source control.
The unique path to the block of data to use in creating the view.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView"></xref> object.

Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged"></xref> event when the properties of the data source have changed and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents*> property value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The OnDataSourceChanged method notifies the designer of each control bound to the associated data source to refresh its control in the design host.

This method can be suppressed with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> method, or by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method with an argument of `false`.
An <xref:System.EventArgs> object provided by the calling object.

Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed"></xref> event when the schema of the data source has changed and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents*> property value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
This method notifies the designers of each control bound to the associated data source that the fields in the schema have changed.

This method can be suppressed with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> method, or by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method with an argument of `true`.
An <xref:System.EventArgs> object.
Refreshes the schema of the data.
This method is not supported in this class, but is implemented in derived classes, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> class.
This parameter is not used in this implementation.
However, it should be supported in derived classes.
In all cases.
Restores data source events after they have been suppressed.

Data source events can be suppressed by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A> property to `false`, or by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method with an argument of `true`.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs after the schema has been refreshed.
To be added.
Postpones all data source events until after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents*> method is called.
Indicates whether data source events have been disabled.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed"></xref> event has been disabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
